Endpoint to create location for a payload.

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixLocSolicitadaV2X","description":"","required":["tipoCob"],"type":"object","properties":{"tipoCob":{"description":"Type of locations to return in response.","enum":["cob","cobv"],"type":"string"}},"example":{"tipoCob":"cob"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
